  • Examples

Bling

These components are used to provide additional content that helps the viewer understand the value of what we do. Things like client logos and testimonials aren’t essential to describing what we do, but they make us look better. You know… bling!

Testimonial

The value they bring to a project is immeasurable. They’re always focused on asking the right question, digging into the core of the problem, and coming up with excellent strategic solutions.

Matt Malament - Director, Global Category Strategy at InterContinental Hotels Group 
<div class="testimonial">
  <blockquote>
    <p>The value they bring to a project is immeasurable. They&rsquo;re always focused on asking the right question, digging into the core of the problem, and coming up with excellent strategic solutions.</p>
    <cite class="align-right">Matt Malament - Director, Global Category Strategy at InterContinental Hotels Group</cite>
  </blockquote>
</div>
